MismatchedBody.fix: make sure the body payload corresponds to the used content type

DoubleFileExtension.fix: unload one of the two handlers registering the file extension

ErrorInConfigFile.fix: check errors in config file by running {1}

InvalidReturnedBody.message: invalid body returned from route, got `{0}`
InvalidReturnedBody.fix: return a proper body from route

InvalidDefaultExport.fix: use only functions for the default export

InvalidPath.fix: use only letters, digits, '[', ']' and '=' in paths

DoublePathParameter.fix: disambiguate path parameters in route names

InvalidTypeExport.fix: export object with a `base` string and a `validate` function

InvalidTypeName.fix: use lowercase-first latin letters and decimals in type names

MismatchedPath.fix: fix the type or the caller

MismatchedType.fix: fix the type or the caller

ModuleHasNoHooks.fix: ensure every module uses at least one hook or deactivate it

ModuleHasNoName.message: module at index {0} has no name
ModuleHasNoName.fix: update module at index {0} and inform maintainer

ModulesMustBeArray.message: the {0} config property must be an array
ModulesMustBeArray.fix: change {0} to an array in the config or remove this property

EmptyConfigFile.fix: add configuration options or remove file

NoHandlerForComponent.fix: add handler module for this component or remove {0}

ReservedTypeName.fix: do not use any reserved type names
